sentences.en: a few moments of blessed silence
Ahead lay the scalloped ocean and the abounding blessed isles.
sentences.cn: 再往前是水波荡漾的海洋和星罗棋布的宝岛.

sentences.en: At the festival, candles are blessed and sprinkled with holy water.
sentences.cn: 在节日里，要对蜡烛祝圣，并洒以圣水。

sentences.en: Both are blessed with uncommon ability to fix things.
sentences.cn: 两人在修理东西上都有一手绝活。

sentences.en: Carol Drinkwater is blessed with a fine bone structure that stands up better to the ravages of time.
sentences.cn: 卡罗尔·德林克沃特生就一副好身板，经过岁月历练还那么硬朗。

sentences.en: God blessed him with a good son.
sentences.cn: 上帝保佑他有个好儿子.

sentences.en: He is blessed in having such a good wife.
sentences.cn: 他有幸娶到如此一位贤妻.

sentences.en: He is blessed with good health.
sentences.cn: 他享有良好健康的幸福.

sentences.en: Her favorite Beatitude is " Blessed are the meek for they shall inherit the earth ".
sentences.cn: 她最喜欢的至福是 “ 保佑温顺的人,他们将继承土地 ”.

sentences.en: It is more blessed to give than to receive.
Rainy weather brings blessed relief to hay fever victims.
sentences.cn: 雨天会给枯草热患者带来欣喜，减轻他们的痛苦。

sentences.en: The priest blessed the bread and wine.
The world was a blessed place before the Fall.
sentences.cn: 世界在人类堕落之前本是一块福地.

sentences.en: Then he added, " Blessed Virgin, pray for the death of this fish.
sentences.cn: 然后他加上了两句: “ 万福童贞圣母, 请您祈祷叫这鱼死去.

sentences.en: They brought the children to Jesus and he blessed them.
sentences.cn: 他们把孩子带到耶稣跟前，耶稣祝福了他们。

words.tran_cn: 使幸福（bless的ing形式）；使神圣化；为…祈神赐福
祝福；保佑（bless的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 在…方面有福；赋有…的；享有…的

trans.tran_cn: 神圣的，有福的， 无忧无虑的
